items.title: Treasury yields retreat ahead of the Christmas holiday
items.description: Treasury yields retreated Tuesday in a holiday-shortened trading session ahead of the Christmas break.

items.title: European markets open higher in shortened session ahead of Christmas; Novo Nordisk resumes recovery
items.description: European stocks edged higher at the open on Tuesday.

items.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed after Wall Street gains on tech strength
items.description: Traders will monitor any developments related to the planned merger of Japanese automakers Nissan and Honda.

items.title: S&P 500 futures are little changed after positive start to the holiday trading week: Live updates
items.description: The major averages posted modest gains on Monday to begin the holiday-shortened trading week.

items.title: China plans $411 billion special treasury bond issuance next year, Reuters reports
items.description: Chinese authorities is issuing $411 billion worth of special treasury bonds next year, which would be the highest on record, Reuters reports.
